author: Annie Campbell
comment: Love this app, great funky design. The only down side-The battery symbol doesnt change to reflect battery usage.

author: Christopher Wyatt
comment: It's great, can you fix the battery indicator and update for Wear 2.0?
Ambient mode should not grey out the text since this does not save energy compared to white text

reply.author: KvnX Dev
reply.content:
Hello,
thanks for your review. 

Actually you can de-activate the ambient mode to enjoy colors all the time. You can find this under the option "energy safe mode".

Edit: Any feedback? Helped it?
